alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Ottawa; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 28 at 2:53PM CDT until March 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 020, AND 034... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 008, 020, and 034. * WIND...South-southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * HUMIDITY...Falling to 20 to 25 percent in the afternoon. * THUNDERSTORMS...Thunderstorms are unlikely during the afternoon, though can`t be ruled out during the evening in the watch area. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
